DOC.brief_title: Collecting Solid Tumor Tissue Identify New Treatments

A critical challenge extend study involve identification validation new therapeutic target future cancer therapy . - The Surgery Branch , NCI interest identify novel molecular biologic target facilitate development future cancer therapy . In addition , primary responsibility provide surgical consultative service NIH . As , uniquely position acquire perform important study solid tumor tissue help identify therapeutic target may significant clinical ramification . ELIGIBILITY : - Patients great equal 16 year age radiographic evidence , biochemical evidence , histologically/cytologically proven solid neoplasm require diagnostic therapeutic intervention part diagnosis /or standard care treatment and/or follow neoplasm - Patients must laboratory physical examination parameter within acceptable limit standard practice guideline prior plan intervention DESIGN : - A tissue acquisition trial tissue obtain time intervention - Tissue blood process time collection , store transfer Dr. Kammula laboratory processing . - No investigational therapy give . - It anticipated 1000 patient enrol period 10 year
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients must great equal 16 year age . Patients premalignant , primary metastatic solid tumor base upon either radiographic biochemical testing , histological/cytological analysis require surgery biopsy part standard care diagnosis , treatment and/or follow Patients must laboratory physical examination parameter within acceptable limit standard practice guideline prior biopsy surgery . Patients must plan undergo surgery biopsy part treatment plan . Note : Patients enrol exclusively procurement tissue sample . Patients agree undergo leukapheresis must meet following criterion : Seronegative HIV Seronegative hepatitis B surface antigen seronegative antibody hepatitis C. CBC within normal limit
